mapper.select: select reply_num replyNum, board_num boardNum, user_id userId, user_nickname userNickname, reply_content replyContent, reply_createdate replyCreatedate from single_reply where board_num = #{boardNum} order by reply_createdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into single_reply(reply_num, board_num, user_id, user_nickname, reply_content, reply_createdate) values(reply_num_seq.nextval, #{boardNum}, #{userId}, #{userNickname}, #{replyContent}, sysdate)
